page.title: Sponsors
page.content:
The NR Band Boosters are very grateful for the generous support received from many individuals and organizations. The list below includes some of the recent support provided. Please let these individuals and organizations know that you appreciate their support when you get a chance.

Bob Serpentini - Serpentini Auto Group
In addition to being a major contributor for the new Stadium, Bob has donated multiple cars for the annual raffles that support the North Royalton school district.
Royalton Music Center
Lauren Haas Amanfoh, owner of Royalton Music Center, has supported the band on many occasions throughout the years. Her latest contribution was the plaques for the Band Festival participants.
Chik-Fil-A
Chick-Fil-A has been generously donating chicken sandwiches to the NR Band to sell at the football games. They are conveniently located at 16584 Royalton Rd Strongsville, OH 44136
The 3 Spot
The 3 Spot has hosted multiple fund raisers in support of the band including the highly successful Raffle Fundraiser in April 2014. They are conveniently located near the stadium at 13855 Ridge Rd., North Royalton, OH 44133
Rosa’s Pizza
Rosa’s Pizza has donated pizzas to the North Royalton Band on many occasions including band competitions held at the North Royalton High School. Their North Royalton store is located at 12971 State Rd at Royalwood. Their phone number is: (440) 237-6200
The Cleaning Authority
Janice and Terry DeLap, owners of the local office of The Cleaning Authority, are strong supporters of the North Royalton Band program and have graciously offered to donate $50.00 for any new client that lets them know they are a band booster when they sign up for service. Located in the center of North Royalton at State Road and Royalwood Road, Janice and Terry take pride in their service to busy families, retirees and road warriors. They believe “Life’s too short to clean your own home!”. Contact them today at (440) 877-9809 or tcabroadviewhts@sbcglobal.net
North Royalton Giant Eagle
Giant Eagle regularly donates food products to Band fundraisers. They have donated cakes every year for the end of the year Band Awards Banquet. Please support Giant Eagle and let them know you appreciate the support and donations they have provided to the North Royalton Band program throughout the years. The North Royalton Giant Eagle is conveniently located at 6000 Royalton Road at the State Road intersection. Their phone number is: (440) 237-3061.
Aztek - Website design, development, and digital marketing
Aztek is a Cleveland-based website design, development, and digital marketing company. Aztek donates the website hosting services for the Band Boosters Website. The Band Boosters website design, development, and ongoing maintenance are donated by David Skorepa, Aztek's Chief Creative Officer.
